title: 31 How to Be Innovative (Plus Turn Ideas Into Profitable Products) with Chris Hawker
description: Have you ever had a bright idea; one that you thought would make you millions, but you didn't know how invent it or bring it to market? Well, in this weeks episode I have world famous inventor Chris Hawker to show you how it's done. Chris is a great friend, and one of my first mentors [因
